resources.string:
3 cups butter, softened 
 1–½ cups cornstarch 
 1–½ cups confectioners' sugar, sifted 
 4–½ cups all purpose flour 
 halved candied cherries
In a large bowl, cream butter and confectioners\' sugar until light and fluffy, about 5 minutes. \n Gradually add flour and cornstarch, beating until well blended

With hands lightly dusted with additional cornstarch, roll dough into 1 inch balls. 
 Place 1 inch apart on ungreased baking sheets. 
 Lightly press with floured fork. 
 Top with cherry halves.
Bake at 300 degrees until bottoms are lightly brownied, 20-22 minutes. \n Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pans to wire racks
